feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [SBG3][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 11, 05:00 - 14:00 UTC

Nov 22, 19:11 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/12/2023 05:00 UTC
End time : 11/12/2023 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - R806R16 - R806R17 - R806R18
entry.content:
Nov 21, 11:29 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 21/11/2023 06:49 UTC
End Time : 21/11/2023 11:40 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX8
Root cause : Failure on a cooling system module. all the impacted servers are operational.

Nov 21, 10:47 UTC
Monitoring - Start time: 21/11/2023 06:49 UTC
User impact : All servers in racks R806R16, R806R17 and R806R18 are operational again.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX8
Ongoin Actions: Monitoring
Root cause : Failure on a cooling system module.
Ongoing actions : A replacement of the affected equipment is in progress.

Nov 21, 09:57 UTC
Update - Most of the affected servers are now operational as usual, our technical teams are working on the remaining servers.

Nov 21, 07:35 UTC
Identified - Start time: 21/11/2023 06:49 UTC
User impact : Some servers in racks R806R16, R806R17 and R806R18 are currently unreachable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX8
Root cause : Failure on a cooling system module.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on a fix.
